Package projectone

package projectone
  • Class
    Description
    ActionCard
    Represents an action card in an Uno game (Skip, Reverse, Draw Two).
    BasicAIStrategy
    A basic AI strategy that selects the first playable card and chooses wild color based on frequency of colors in hand.
    Card
     
    Color
     
    Deck
    Represents the Uno draw deck, containing all playable cards.
    Hand
     
    HumanStrategy
    Strategy implementation for a human-controlled player.
    NumberCard
     
    Pile
    Represents a pile of cards, specifically the discard pile in an Uno game.
    Player
    Represents a single player in the Uno game.
    PlayerStrategy
    Strategy interface for deciding how a player selects a card and wild color.
